__prompts__.project_date: Date for the project formatted like YYYYMMDD. Used for forming project name and slug.
__prompts__.project_owner_last: Last name of the project owner. Used for forming project name and slug.
__prompts__.project_organism: Organism for the project. Used for forming project name and slug.
__prompts__.project_brief: Very short (1-3 word) project desciption, e.g. Cancer drug. Used for forming project name and slug.
__prompts__.project_type: Type of project. Used for forming project name and slug.
__prompts__.project_name: Project name formed from inputs above.
__prompts__.project_slug: Project slug formed from inputs above.
__prompts__.project_purpose: Brief description of project purpose. Used for README.
__prompts__.author: Project author name. Used for README.
__prompts__.email: Email address. Used for README and SBATCH `--mail-user` header.
__prompts__.slurm_account: SLURM project account. Used for SBATCH `--account` header.
__prompts__.slurm_partition: SLURM partition. Used for SBATCH `--partition` header.
__prompts__.slurm_qos: SLURM QOS. Used for SBATCH `--qos` header.
